member.name: T:MediaMetadata.cs.fMetadata
member.summary: A GUI for the program in the shape of a windows form object.

members.member:
Some movies on IMDb have different titles that are either extremely different, or they are a portion of the full name as a temperory solution, this function will replace some of those issues
TODO: Allow fuzziness by checking to see if the entire name before a punctuation mark matches or the entire name on the IMDb or Movie Name side matches. This should only be allowed if the movie name does not appear on the results page at all.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MediaMetadata.cs.fMetadata.InitializeComponent

member.name: M:MediaMetadata.cs.IMDBSearch.getData(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fetches the data for the given movie from IMDb's website using a scraper.
member.param: The title of the movie to find.
The year the movie was released.
member.returns: A Movie object containing the found data.
